column4: one quick question: will there be a way to upgrade to hoary from a existing warty-installation?
yes. There is documents about that on the ubuntu wiki (check the ubuntu homepage)
thanks, havent found anything about it yet.
its just a matter of changing every warty  word in either synaptic or doing it manually by editing /etc/apt/sources.list.   http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/GuideToHoary
